ComicInfo.Writer: Al Feldstein,Johnny Craig,Bill Gaines,Johnny Craig,Bill Gaines,Al Feldstein

ComicInfo.Title: The Tryst!; in gratitude...; The Space Suitors; ...Three's A Crowd
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Tryst!: A man is so jealous of his wife that he murders a boy from the local orphanage that she has been spending time with in the woods.
in gratitude...: A Korean war vet berates his hometown because his black friend, who threw himself on a grenade to save his life, wasn't good enough to be buried in the town cemetery.
The Space Suitors: A woman and her lover plan to murder her husband out in space, but he outsmarts them by giving a signal to the rocket to blast off when he shot so that his wife and her lover will suffocate on the barren planetoid.
...Three's A Crowd: A jealous husband sends his wife and his best friend to their deaths when their suspicious behavior makes him leap to the conclusion that they are having an affair, but they are, in reality, planning an anniversary surprise.
ComicInfo.Characters: Mr. Cowles (Hendrick's employee),Mr. Farnsworth (client of Hendricks, death),John Hendricks (villain, Julie's boss and later husband),Julie Adams [aka Julie Hendricks] (a secretary),Tommy (an orphan, death)
